32 // Rising
33 if (delta >= 0.0f) {
34 if (state >= target_val) {
35 delta = 0.0f;
36 }
37 }
38 // Falling
39 else {
40 if (state <= target_val) {
41 delta = 0.0f;
42 }
43 }
44
45 state += delta;
46
